description:
Design your perfect business and avoid the costly pitfalls that 99.7% of even the most seasoned entrepreneurs experience.

  • Have a great idea for a business?
  • Have a existing business and want to make it a profit machine?
  • Do you think you have what it takes to run a highly successful business?

Get the 21 must knows in this ground breaking course, with 21 lecture modules, plus 21 easy to follow and downloadable PDF mind maps, that will give you the proven methods for achieving phenomenal success with your entrepreneurial efforts.

This course is lead by Jack Voorheis, a 5th generation record setting entrepreneur with a lifetime of experience building his own companies and helping others create small, medium and large businesses. Jack shares how to significantly shorten the process of building highly successful businesses with both online and offline models.
title: 21 Game Changers for Crafting Your Perfect Business Formula.
